definitions.text: flowing in drops; the formation and falling of drops of liquid
examples: there's a drip through the roof

definitions.text: the sound of a liquid falling drop by drop
examples: the constant sound of dripping irritated him

definitions.text: (architecture) a projection from a cornice or sill designed to protect the area below from rainwater (as over a window or doorway)

examples: Water is dripping from the faucet

definitions.text: let or cause to fall in drops
